entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 02:42 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 02:42 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
